00044 # define H_RStat

00051 namespace TREX {
00052   namespace utils {
00053 
00066     class RStat {
00067     public:
00073       enum who_type {
00076        self = RUSAGE_SELF, 
00083        children = RUSAGE_CHILDREN,
00089        zeroed = 1,
00090        unknown = 2
00091       }; // RStat::who_type
00092     
00107       RStat(who_type who=self);
00109       ~RStat() {}
00110     
00125       void reset(who_type who=unknown);
00126     
00132       who_type who() const {
00133        return _kind;
00134       }
00135     
00144       timeval const &user_time() const {
00145        return _snapshot.ru_utime;
00146       }
00147     
00156       timeval const &system_time() const {
00157        return _snapshot.ru_stime;
00158       }
00159     
00186       long const &max_resident() const {
00187        return _snapshot.ru_maxrss;
00188       }
00189     
00194       long const &n_page_reclaims() const {
00195        return _snapshot.ru_minflt;
00196       }
00201       long const &n_page_faults() const {
00202        return _snapshot.ru_majflt;
00203       }
00204     
00220       RStat operator- (RStat const &other) const;
00221 
00237       RStat operator+ (RStat const &other) const;
00245       RStat operator* (long n) const;
00255       RStat operator/ (long n) const;
00256     
00268       std::ostream &long_desc(std::ostream &out) const;
00285       std::ostream &compact_desc(std::ostream &out) const;
00286 
00288       static std::string compact_header();
00289 
00290     private:
00292       who_type _kind;
00294       rusage   _snapshot;
00295     
00301       RStat(who_type who, bool)
00302        :_kind(who) {}
00303     }; // RStat
00304 
00318     inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, RStat const &stats) {
00319       return stats.compact_desc(out);
00320     }
00321   
00333     inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, RStat::who_type who) {
00334       switch( who ) {
00335       case RStat::self:
00336        return out<<"self";
00337       case RStat::children:
00338        return out<<"children";
00339       default:
00340        return out<<"???";
00341       }
00342     }
00343 
00358     inline RStat operator* (long n, RStat const &s) {
00359       return s*n;
00360     }
00361 
00372     class RStatLap {
00373     public:
00381       RStatLap(RStat &output, RStat::who_type who)
00382        :m_output(output), m_start(who) {
00383       }
00389       ~RStatLap() {
00390        RStat end(m_start.who());
00391        m_output = m_output+(end-m_start);
00392       }
00393       
00394     private:
00395       RStat &m_output; 
00396       RStat m_start;   
00397 
00398       // Following methods have no code in purpose
00399       RStatLap();
00400     }; // TREX::utils::RStatLap
00401 
00402   } // TREX::utils
00403 } // TREX
